# Tyranny (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Hextor]], Typhos, Vecna, Wee Jas |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Thurian:* | Menoth, Scion Ekris |
| | *Toril:* | Bane, Tiamat |

**Granted Power:** Add +1 to the save DC of any compulsion spell you cast.

**Tyranny Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Command (Spell)|Command]]****:** One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

**2** **[[Enthrall (Spell)|Enthrall]]****:** Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

**3** **[[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]****:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**4** **[[Fear (Spell)|Fear]]****:** Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

**5** **[[Command, Greater (Spell)|Command, Greater]]****:** As *command,* but affects one subject/level.

**6** **[[Geas_Quest (Spell)|Geas/Quest]]****:** As *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]]**,* plus it affects any creature.

**7** **[[Grasping Hand (Spell)|Grasping Hand]]****:** Hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.

**8** **[[Charm Monster, Mass (Spell)|Charm Monster, Mass]]****:** As *[[Charm Monster (Spell)|charm monster]]**,* but all within 30 ft.

**9** **[[Dominate Monster (Spell)|Dominate Monster]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]**,* but any creature.


| **Source:** | Complete Warrior (WotC), pg. 115 |
|---|---|
| | Iron Kingdoms Character Guide (Privateer Press), pg. 291 |
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 92 |
| | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 281 |
